div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 978 Karavelovo, c. 60 km. N of Plovdiv, Bulgaria, 1967 Burial: 1st cent. B.C.? (T) Contents: 40 AR. Pot hoard Thasos: 1 spread-flan tetradr. Imit. Thasos: 1 tetradr. Athens: 3 New Style tetradr. Roman Rep.: 35 den. Disposition: Karlovo Reported by T. Gerasimov
